title: Kung Pow II: Tongue of Fury
description: The long-awaited sequel to Kung Pow! Enter the Fist. The Chosen One returns and must face a whole new set of foes, human and otherwise.
quote: Hmm! I see you brought your friends this time.
altHero: The Chosen One, on a cliff by the sea, opens his shirt to touch his nipple
alt1: the Eiffel Tower with many pyramids flying around it in the sky
alt2: two figures in an ancient-looking courtyard and a giant dinosaur foot enters the frame
alt3: a man screams as he holds a cylindrical object with a long chain; a cylindrical hole in his torso shows the landscape behind him
alt4: farm animals in martial arts poses, ready to fight
